translations: n.导尿管，尿液管（catheter 的复数形式）；医用导管

sentences.sentence: The surgeon placed catheters through the veins and arteries near the base of the head.
sentences.translation: 外科医生把导管插入靠近大脑底部附近的血管和动脉。

sentences.sentence: Another method involves cooling the tips of the catheters, which freezes the problem tissue.
sentences.translation: 另一种方法则是对导管尾部附近的组织进行冷冻。

sentences.sentence: Ablation therapy. In this procedure, one or more catheters are threaded through your blood vessels to your inner heart.
sentences.translation: 消融术这种方法将一个或多个导管通过血管穿入心脏并定位于引起心率失常的病灶处。
